title: ‘There’s no place like Chrome’ ads target iPhone owners that already use the desktop browser
content:
Google has a new series of ads that are aimed at getting iPhone users to switch to its browser by pointing out how they’re likely using desktop Chrome and could get those features on mobile. 

more…

The post ‘There’s no place like Chrome’ ads target iPhone owners that already use the desktop browser appeared first on 9to5Google.
